content: I have some advice for Kansas, vet your people and stop sending us refugees like Kathleen Sebelius who is one of the most incompetent people ever seen as a Cabinet member. At least they showed the good sense not to send a civil rights lawyer to DC, read community activist, to defend students indoctrinated in being snowflakes. I smell an opportunist rat here, this guy was a registered Republican until March of 2016 and probably saw an opportunity to ride the ESTABLISHMENT ANTI TRUMP BANDWAGON to victory as a Dem and got burned. The Dems gave him no money since they looked at his policies an smelled a McCain on their side of the fence, not gonna happen.
